settings.title: When does Black Friday start?
settings.content: No need to wait till the end of November. Our Black Friday sale begins Monday, November 3 at 12 AM, giving you early access to the biggest savings of the year.

settings.title: What kind of discounts can I expect?
settings.content: You can expect huge savings on our bundles, free gifts with every e-scooter, and exclusive Black Friday bundles you won’t find any other time of year.

settings.title: Are stock levels limited?
settings.content: Yes, stock is limited. With how quickly our e-scooters sell, we’re expecting to be completely sold out during the Black Friday sale.

settings.title: Is the warranty still the same during Black Friday?
settings.content: Yes, our warranty stays the same. Every e-scooter purchased during Black Friday is fully covered by our standard warranty.

settings.title: BLACK FRIDAY FAQ
settings.content: The deals move fast and we don’t want you missing out. Here’s everything you need to know before the scooters fly off the shelf.
settings.support_hours: Our customer support is available Monday to Friday: 8am-8:30pm.
